nodes.text: The Ipellrilla system was a star system that was located within the Glythe sector, part of the Mid Rim and New Territories regions of the galaxy. A hyperlane connected the system to the worlds Fornax and Nentan. The Ipellrilla system fell within the borders of the New Republic in 12 ABY. The system was the origin point of the Ipellrilla firewater beverage.
The Ipellrilla system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-7.
